pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correlation of Bivariate Survival Times // Estimates correlation coefficients with associated confidence limits for bivariate, partially censored survival times. Uses the iterative multiple imputation approach proposed by Schemper, Kaider, Wakounig and Heinze (2013) doi:10.1002/sim.5874. Provides a scatterplot function to visualize the bivariate distribution, either on the original time scale or as copula.
